Name: David
description:
David is 62 years old, married and blessed with four school-going children. He has had beekeeping business for thirty years earning a monthly income of KES 40,000.

David has applied for a second loan after successfully paying off his previous loan. He will be using this loan to purchase more beehives and hopes this will improve his beekeeping farming activity. The anticipated profit he will use to provide basic needs for his family and to educate his children.

David's hopes and dreams for the future are to grow his beekeeping business and be financially stable.
